title: India keen to speed up power grid link talks with Sri Lanka
description: India is actively pursuing discussions with Sri Lanka to establish a power grid link, focusing on renewable energy for electricity trading. The project includes overhead and under-sea cables, with economic benefits being evaluated by PwC India and plans for a joint consultant for investment decisions.
